articles.description: A retired police dog handler has revealed his canine once made a lunge for the future King at the royal residence while they were on duty at Sandringham House
articles.content:
Prince William was cornered by a snarling police dog on the Sandringham estate, it has been revealed.
The Royal was enjoying a late night walk when the attack dog mistook him for an intruder.
Willi… [+2214 chars]

articles.title: Fashion goes soft as Fendi turns boots into slippers - The Guardian
articles.description: Milan fashion week is virtual this year, but Fendi has a six-minute menswear showstopper focusing on lockdown comfort
articles.content: The first outfit in Fendis latest luxury menswear line-up was showcased on Saturday in a music video-style film streamed from a digital-only Milan fashion week. It starred the padded olive silk inner… [+2254 chars]

articles.author: Latoya Gayle
articles.title: Netflix's Bridgerton sparks social media trend for making dresses and corsets - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bridgerton fans have been recreating the early-19th century look portrayed in Netflix's hit show. And British search engine Lyst now claims demand for corsets and empire line dresses has soared.
articles.content:
It's been the lockdown must-watch, but it seems Bridgerton is now inspiring how we dress, with fans donning Regency-era style garments and sharing their looks on social media.
Viewers smitten with t… [+1947 chars]
